response.overview: According to an ancient prophecy of Mitar Tarabic, in a far away galaxy there is a star that causes grief, ill-luck and misfortune for Serbia, and it's position disturbs Serbia's development for centuries. By destroying that star, Serbs will gain the power they deserve, and everything will finally go for the better. King, along with the team of the Ministry of Astrology of Kingdom Serbia, will make a decision to ruin the star by any cause, and after many years (mostly) Serbian engineers will create the ship "Stefan Decanski". It is the year 2309. and brave Serbian heroes are plunged into the distant universe to destroy the evil, a star more known by the name of Star Three.
response.title: Zvezda Tri
